author: djrtwo
content:
Consensus layer specs `v1.4.0-beta.4` -- Prove It -- released!

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.4.0-beta.4

Thanks <@520034910149410861> for a huge simplification in the blob p2p spec ğŸ™ 

It's expected to take a few weeks for client teams to work in these (largely simplifying) changes before the next wave of devnets
